mapper.update: update t_parklot_sale set parklotNum = #{parklotnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parkCentificateNum = #{parkcentificatenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subscriber = #{subscriber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subscribeDate = #{subscribedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, subscriberTel = #{subscribertel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parklotSaler = #{parklotsaler,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parklotDealPrice = #{parklotdealprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, carparkId = #{carparkid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where lotsaleId = #{lotsaleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select lotsaleId, parklotNum, parkCentificateNum, subscriber, subscribeDate, subscriberTel, parklotSaler, parklotDealPrice, carparkId from t_parklot_sale where lotsaleId = #{lotsaleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
